title: What is Best First Search?
content: Best First Search is a searching algorithm that uses a priority queue and heuristic search to find the shortest path from the initial state to the goal state.
subtopics: Comparison of Best First Search Algorithm
Advantages and Disadvantages of Best First Search Algorithm

title: Supervised Learning
content: Supervised Learning is an ML technique where a model learns from labeled data. It is used for classification and regression tasks.
